MESSAGE.author: yiluweiyi
MESSAGE.text: believe it or not, i've clicked almost all the links! ^_^ much useful information and nice photos! Thanks!

MESSAGE.author: Paul Yuan
MESSAGE.text: Sweet website, i'm impressed! as always, and i love your excitement about nerdy stuff =) Hope Berkeley's treating you well, keep up your studies Dr. Liu. God Bless
